Kanye West released multiple versions of his album *Bully* ahead of its originally announced June 15, 2025 date. On March 19, 2025, he surprise-released the project as a 45-minute music video/short film on YouTube and Apple Music under the title *BULLY V1* [9][10][11]. Despite this characterization, the album was made available for streaming on Apple Music and YouTube, which are official platforms per the resolution criteria [9][11][15].

The original June 15 date remains listed for the album, but the March release independently satisfies the resolution conditions.
